text.17_Chapter, 12_Verse, 0_Comment: Whole-hearted: The letter 'Tav' is large, indicating that if you go whole-heartedly, it is as if you have fulfilled from 'Aleph' to 'Tav' ("from A to Z").
text.25_Chapter, 16_Verse, 0_Comment: 1. To YHVH you  are to declare today. The numerology of this phrase is equal to the phrase "the recitation of the Shema"
